title: Track Department Spending Against Budget
description: A department head wants to see a report of their department's spending year-to-date compared to their budget.

tasks.description: Identify the department head and their department.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the user and their associated department.

tasks.description: Generate a budget vs. actuals report for the department.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully generates the financial report.

tasks.description: Provide the report to the department head, highlighting any areas of over- or under-spending.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent delivers the report with a summary of key variances.
